title: Pre-Lease Spacious 2Bed 2Bath with A/C & Tons of Natural Light Today!
posting_body: Discover and explore Vale Apartments to find out what makes our community unique
Self Guided, Touchless & Virtual Tours Available Now!
Vale Apartments is a new boutique community featuring unique amenities in the heart of downtown Issaquah.
With a walk score of 76, Vale offers a dynamic mix of retail, restaurants, and inviting outdoor spaces all only a few steps away.

Vale is located on the Juniper Trail, so residents can enjoy a convenient 5 minute bike ride or a 12 minute walk to the Issaquah Park-n-Ride as well as beautifully landscaped parks within 1/4 mile for your furry friends.
Issaquah is the gateway to big city amenities and mountain recreation, all outside Vale's doorstep.
In this Built Green 4-Star building, select between a variety of studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans.
Designer finishes include quartz counter tops, ceramic back splashes and luxury plank flooring.
All homes come with free WiFi as well.
Community WiFi available in all areas.
A Variety of sizes and layouts, our floor plans offer thoughtful design for the modern way of life.
Residents will be able to enjoy two entertaining rooftop decks, a convenient rooftop pea patch, an expansive lounge with full gourmet kitchen, and a top of the line fitness center.
Vale also has an elegant grand lobby where residents can relax and unwind by the fireplace.
With convenient access to the Juniper Train, Vale features a vast bike room with a work station, for our avid multi-modal residents.
Want more information on this unit?
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1146-1150 Sq.
- Our premium two bedroom, two bathroom, with floor to ceiling windows that wrap this beautiful corner home and provide you with an abundance of natural lighting.
With northwestern or northeastern views you will enjoy from your private balcony, all day long.
Fully furnished with a large eight foot long island kitchen style sure to be the center of your social gatherings.
Along with a generous living and dining space, two full size bedrooms, walk in closets, and bathrooms, along with plenty of storage space, you are going to absolutely love your new home.
- With convenient access to the Juniper Trail, Vale features a vast bike room with a work station, for our avid multi-modal tenants.
- On those days you can't go for a hike or take a ride.
- Enjoy this multi-purpose space to play games, enjoy movies with friends or host a party.
- From this vantage point you'll love to BBQ, garden in the community pea patch or sit by a fire to take in the territorial views.
From I-90 Eastbound take exit 17, stay in right hand lane, turn right onto Front Street, then right onto NW Gilman Blvd, left onto 7th Ave NW.
We'll be straight ahead, past Safeway.
I-90 Westbound take exit 17, turn left at light onto Front Street.
Right onto NW Gilman Blvd, then left onto 7th Ave NW.
We'll be straight ahead, past Safeway.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
